resources.string: Continuous sign up for 7 days, extra bonus 5 coins.
How to withdraw cash in PP currency?

PP coin is the key circulation token of BC mainland. It is based on the platform of Ethernet square and developed according to the ERC20 standard agreement. It can be used to buy members, courses, books and other services in the community. PP coin also has strong voting power and influence to change the development direction of BC mainland. PP currency can also be converted into other virtual currencies through the trading platform, with value reserves, trading circulation, value preservation and appreciation functions.

1. When the user reads the BC Mainland Small program, the system will calculate a certain PP coin reward to the user according to the user's reading time. This is also the original "learning is making money" and "reading is digging" mode of BC mainland. 
 2. every day the user login to the BC mainland applet, which will reward the PP currency. 
 3. sign in every day and sign in for a week, reward PP coins. 
 4. when users transmit articles in small programs, they will reward PP coins. 
 5. answers to win PP coins. BC mainland will set up a long-term knowledge of the block chain answer link, to achieve different scores will have different PP coin awards. 
 6. users are rewarded through the BC's official irregular airdrop. 
 7. users can get PP coins directly through the exchange.

1. If you don\'t bring the money to an Ethernet wallet (such as an imtoken wallet), you can transfer it to a small personal center on the BC mainland. \n 2. If the money has been mentioned in the Ethernet wallet, it can be transferred to other people through the wallet itself, or it can be collected through the wallet.

PP currency withdrawals are: 
 1. Users can pick it up in the personal center of the applet and distribute it to users in the form of a Wechat Red Packet from BC Mainland. 
 2. users can cash in their own Ethernet purse, such as imtoken wallet, long-term holding currency and value added. 
 3. after the PP currency online exchange, users can cash the PP currency to the stock exchange. Transaction realisation.
You can click on members\' display cards in the front page and choose "automatic renewal of management" - "cancel renewals".

They insist and believe that Block Chain technology can change the world and improve human life. It is the preacher and educator of Block Chain culture and value. They gain a sense of achievement and practical rewards by serving the original inhabitants of BC. BC Daren are a group of continental co-builders with dreams and wisdom, and strive to create a better and more suitable ecological environment for the survival and development of the block chain. 

 Pay: 
 Deeply participate in the community building of the BC mainland, as a community node to promote and share block chain related courses and culture, so that more people can participate in and build the BC mainland. 
 Reward: 
 Active BC continental token incentives can cash in, replace other virtual digital assets, or buy BC continental goods and services, can also upgrade the rank of BC up to get more power and welfare.
